hero.headline: Intelligent agents driving an
hero.subHeadline: Our platform is a decentralized intelligence economy designed to scale data and AI monetization. Datasets and models become liquid, revenue-generating assets. Enabled and built on 0G, participants can securely upload, rent, and monetize datasets, while building, training, and tokenizing AI models in a single seamless dApp. Every contribution carries ownership, reputation, and exit liquidity. As data compounds, models improve, driving usage.
